title: Coronation Street spoilers: Norris and Emily make surprise returns
text:
With the recent news of Sinead’s (Katie McGlynn) cancer returning in Coronation Street and it being terminal, Daniel (Rob Mallard) and the Barlow’s are supporting her as best they can. As Ken (William Roche) makes an announcement about his upcoming birthday plans, there’s a surprise in store for him as Norris (Malcolm Hebden) and Emily (Eileen Derbyshire) make a surprise return!

Norris was last seen on the cobbles earlier in the year but was only on the street for a brief amount of time, and soon left with Emily’s niece Freda (Ali Briggs) after announcing he was divorcing Mary (Patti Clare) so he could marry Freda. Emily was last seen on the street in 2016 and left to go to Peru to see her nephew.

Ken tells Daniel and Sinead that he’s changed his mind and won’t be going to Italy for his birthday after all as he can’t leave them at such a difficult time.

Advertisement

Advertisement

Claudia’s (Rula Lenska) understanding as to why Ken can’t come away so Audrey (Sue Nicholls) suggests celebrating Ken’s birthday at home rather than Italy. When Claudia mentions her plans for a party although Ken feels this may be inappropriate given Sinead’s situation, Daniel disagrees.

After Daniel and Sinead meet with the oncologist who says her cancer isn’t responding to treatment and she only has a few weeks to live, in a state of shock Sinead’s insistent they must attend Ken’s 80th birthday party. Unaware of the news, at the party Ken’s thrilled to see Norris there and touched when Emily skypes him from Edinburgh!

The happiness of Ken’s birthday celebrations will soon come to an end when Sinead has to break the news to family and friends that she only has weeks to live, it’s certainly set to be another emotional episode.
